text: Creativity is an atheistic religion for white people formed by Ben Klassen in 1973 with his book Nature's Eternal Religion. Its religious orientation is Naturalism. Many consider the religion to be a hate group because they hate black people and Jews. They claim it is a law of Nature for the continuation of the different races and species. They also believe white people are worth more than the other races. Category:1973 establishments in the United States Category:Religion in the United States Category:Race
